document.full_text: the outlook for china's car industry had turned to neutral from positive, weighed down by factors such as rising inflation and weaker consumer confidence, the top executive of saic motor corp  said on friday.
document.title: saic motor expects sharp slowdown in china vehicle market
lines_and_colors: the outlook for china's car industry had turned to neutral from positive, weighed down by factors such as rising inflation and weaker consumer confidence, the top executive of saic motor corp  said on friday.
